a = int(input())
while a != 0:
    a -= 1
    p = int(input())
    q = list(map(int, input().split()))
    q = sorted(q)
    new = []
    for i in q:
        if len(new) >= i:
            new.append(i)
    print(len(new))

from collections import Counter
for i in range(int(input())):
    a = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = 0
    l.sort()
    k = Counter(l)
    for i in k:
        if s >= i:
            s += k[i]
    print(s)
